Ternyata, DPR Telah Menolak Kenaikan Iuran BPJS Kesehatan
01 Nov 2019, 21:29 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Ternyata, DPR Telah Menolak Kenaikan Iuran BPJS Kesehatan

KBRN, Jakarta : Komisi IX DPR RI ternyata telah menolak kenaikan iuran Badan Penyelenggara Jaminan Sosial (BPJS) Kesehatan.Â Anggota Komisi IX DPR RI, Netty Prasetiyani Heryawan mengungkapkan, sesuai hasil rapat kerja (raker) bersama Kementerian Kesehatan (Kemenkes), BPJS Kesehatan, dan Kementerian Keuangan pada 2 September lalu, Senayan telah menolak rencana kenaikan iuran BPJS Kesehatan sebanyak 100 persen."Yang saya baca memang DPR RI keberatan dengan kenaikan premi atau iuran peserta BPJS mandiri," katanya kepada Radio Republik Indonesia, Jumat (1/11/2019).Dalam hasil raker bersama Pemeritah itu, lanjut dia, Komisi IX merekomendasikan untuk menolak kenaikan premi BPJS Kesehatan sampai pemerintah melakukan terobosan yang kreatif dan inovatif untuk menutup defisit.Pasalnya menurut dia, tidak akan mungkin defisit yang dialami oleh BPJS Kesehatan sebanyak triliunan rupiah mampu ditanggulangi oleh iuran BKJS Kesehatan."Karena ga mungkin kita bisa menutup defisit yang disampaikan oleh menteri keuangan pada waktu itu mencapai Rp 32,8 triliun dengan mengandalkan iuran atau premi peserta," pungkas Wakil Ketua Fraksi Partai Keadilan Sejahtera (PKS) ini.Perlu diketahui, beberapa waktu lalu, Presiden RI Joko Widodo (Jokowi) telah menaikkan iuran Badan Penyelenggara Jaminan Sosial (BPJS) Kesehatan sebesar 100 persen. Kenaikan iuran itu berlaku bagi Peserta Bukan Penerima Upah (PBPU) dan peserta bukan pekerja.Aturan terkait itu dituangkan dalam Peraturan Presiden (Perpres) Nomor 75 Tahun 2019 tentang Perubahan Atas Peraturan Presiden Nomor 82 Tahun 2018 tentang Jaminan Kesehatan. (Foto : Ist)

Apparently, the House of Representatives Has Rejected Increase in Health BPJS Contributions
Nov 01 2019, 21:29 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Apparently, the House of Representatives Has Rejected Increase in Health BPJS Contributions

KBRN, Jakarta: The House of Representatives Commission IX turned out to have rejected the increase in contributions from the Health Insurance Provider Board (BPJS). Member of the House of Representatives Commission IX, Netty Prasetiyani Heryawan revealed, according to the results of a working meeting (Raker) with the Ministry of Health (Kemenkes), BPJS Health, and the Ministry of Finance on September 2, Senayan had rejected the planned increase in BPJS Health contributions by 100 percent. I read that the DPR RI objected to the increase in premiums or contributions from independent BPJS participants, "he told Radio Republik Indonesia on Friday (1/11/2019). In the results of the meeting with the Government, he continued, Commission IX recommended to reject the increase in BPJS Health premiums. until the government makes creative and innovative breakthroughs to cover the deficit. According to him, it is not possible for the deficit experienced by BPJS Health as many as trillions of rupiah can be overcome by BKJS Health contributions. "Because there is no way we can cover the deficit submitted by the finance minister at the time "It reached Rp. 32.8 trillion by relying on participants' contributions or premiums," concluded the Deputy Chairperson of Fra This Prosperous Justice Party (PKS). You need to know, some time ago, Indonesian President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) had raised the contribution of the Health Insurance Administering Body (BPJS) by 100 percent. The increase in fees applies to Non-Wage Participants (PBPU) and non-employee participants. The related rules are outlined in Presidential Regulation (Perpres) Number 75 of 2019 concerning Amendments to Presidential Regulation Number 82 of 2018 concerning Health Insurance. (Photo: Ist)
